title: Battleborn Beta Invites Being Sent Out Now
text:
Published By: CinemaBlend.com: Gaming - Today 
Gearbox Software's upcoming cooperative shooter that isn't Borderlands but still starts with the letter 'B' will be commencing into beta tes...
